thread.title: Malala makes emotional return to old home in Pakistan

title: Malala makes emotional return to old home in Pakistan
text:
Malala makes emotional return to old home in Pakistan 12:36am BST - 01:32 
Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai burst into tears and, according to a family friend, took deep breaths as she entered her childhood home in Swat for the first time since a Taliban gunman shot her in 2012. Jillian Kitchener reports.
